content:
To add Broadcast Communications to an incident record, enable at least one broadcast type. From Setup, enter Customer Service Incident Management and click it. Then, find Add Broadcast Communication Related List to Page Layout and click Add to Layout. Select Incident Layout and save changes.

From Setup, enter Lightning App Builder and select it. Find Incident Record Page and click Edit. Add the Related List - Single component under the Related tab and select Broadcast Communications. Save and activate the page.

Enable different broadcast types and give users access from the Customer Service Incident Management setup page.
title: Adding Broadcast Communications to Incident Records in Service Cloud
